mapper.insert: insert into startUp(id, pwd, compName, compCeoName, compEmail, compBizNO, compBizType, compDetailAddr, compAddr, compTel, compStart, compDetail, compImg) values( #{id},#{pwd},#{compName},#{compCeoName},#{compEmail},#{compBizNo},#{compBizType},#{compDetailAddr}, #{compAddr},#{compTel},#{compStart},#{compDetail},#{compImg})

insert into editinfo(no, id, pwd, name, ceoname, email, biztype, addr, detailaddr, tel, career, detail, type, editdate) values(editinfo_seq.NEXTVAL,#{id}, #{pwd}, #{compName},#{compCeoName}, #{compEmail}, #{compBizType},#{compAddr}, #{compDetailAddr}, #{compTel}, #{compStart}, #{compDetail}, 'startup' , sysdate)
